hero.heading: Healing Earth Design
hero.subtitle: Beautiful, functional gardens rooted in ecology, sustainability, and place in mind.

whatIDo.heading: What I Do
whatIDo.tagline: All services are plant-forward and tailored to your space, lifestyle, and experience level.
whatIDo.missionStatement: Thoughtful landscape design rooted in nature and care. Working with natural systems to create resilient, meaningful outdoor spaces.

items.description: Custom planting plans and landscape design drawings
Native, pollinator, vegetable, cut flower, and medicinal herb gardens

about.heading: Healing Earth Design
about.body: Healing Earth Design was founded on the belief that caring for the land can be a powerful form of healing. After experiencing personal loss, I returned to school for sustainable horticulture and landscape design, finding peace and purpose through working with plants, soil, and seasonal rhythms. What began as a way to heal grew into a calling to help others reconnect with the earth in meaningful, practical ways.

contact.heading: Let's Talk!
contact.description: Have questions or ready to start your garden project? I am here to help! Fill out the form and I will get back to you in 1-2 business days. Let's create something beautiful together.

testimonialQuote.quoteText: Sarah created a stunning design for my rain garden. It really brought the project to life and helped me imagine what the space would look like when finished.
